      • values

        public java.lang.String values(java.lang.String lastGlue)
        Build a String with all the vallid values separated by ", ", except the last one which is separated by "$lastGlue ". Similar to Arrays.toString(array) but without the [ and ].
        Parameters:
        lastGlue - used to separate the next last element from the last one, words should start with a space but not end with one.
        Returns:
        "a, b, c$lastGlue d"
